name: (de)constructions ii / deconstructed
description:
a series of artworks that explore the relationships between substance and perception. Every work has two versions: one is a direct representation of my polycircles system with some given parameters; the other work takes every shape (intersections among rings) and draws then arranged in a grid that grows spiralling from the center. What is the reaction, what is the perception? It's the same elements, configuring a different reality. Our lives are all lived out of the same elements, yet they are very differently perceived and lived.

This is the companion work to objkt #214430.

Read more about the origins of the collection and concept at:

https://www.iillucid.com/polycircles-collection/
https://www.iillucid.com/total-cognitive-space/

Artwork by Marcelo Soria-Rodríguez, @msoriaro. 6000x3000px made with Processing.
